title: A promo for a specific card displays in the cart (up to team)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the promo string on top of the payment methods section of the cart
custom_expected: THEN a string will display promoting a certain credit card company (up to specific teams)

title: View Cart button is locked to bottom of the screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the View Cart button
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is locked down to the bottom of the screen

title: The View Cart button is available on the home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Home Screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is available

title: The View Cart button is available on the Browse screens
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Browse screens (search screens)
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is available

title: The View Cart button is available on the Order History main screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Order History main screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is available

title: The View Cart button is not available on item details screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the item details screen for a specific item
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is not available on the Help & Faq screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Help & Faq 
AND is navigated to the Help screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is not available on the Privacy Policy screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Privacy Policy
AND is navigated to the Privacy Policy screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is not available on the Terms and Conditions screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the home screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps Terms and Conditions 
AND is navigated to the Terms and conditions screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is not available on the Payment Selection screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Payment Selection screen
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is not available on the submenus of order history screens
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on a submenu screen for order history
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is not available

title: The View Cart button is available but inactive when a popup is displayed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is navigating the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing a screen where the View Cart button is available
AND the user receives a popup
custom_expected: THEN the View Cart button is visible but not tappable

title: Cart banner does not display when no item added to cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has not added any items to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN there will not be a Cart banner available

title: Cart banner is available when any item added to cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added a single or multiple items to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN there will be a Cart banner available

title: View Cart displays on the cart banner
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN ‘View Cart’ will display on the cart banner

title: Cart is labeled as the header
custom_preconds: GIVEN taps View Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the ‘Cart’ will be labeled as the header in the cart

title: ‘x' button is available in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN taps View Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the ‘x’ button will be available in the cart

title: User is navigated back to previous screen when tapping ‘x’ to close cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN taps View Cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is navigated to the Cart
AND taps the ‘x’ button
custom_expected:
THEN the cart will close
AND the user will be navigated to the previous screen

title: ‘Add more’ button is available in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN taps View Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the the ‘Add More’ button will be available in the cart

title: User is navigated back to the menu for the establishment when tapping ‘add more’
custom_preconds: GIVEN taps View Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected:
AND taps the ‘Add More’ button 
THEN the user will be navigated back to the menu for the specific location where the user will be able to continue shopping

title: Current amount total displays on the cart banner
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN the current total amount for the bill will display on the cart banner

title: Tapping ‘View Cart’ banner navigates user to the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the Cart

title: Screen appears when cart becomes empty indicating cart is empty
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user removes all the items from the cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a screen indicating that there are no items in the cart

title: Removing all Items from cart empties cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user deleted all of the items in the cart
custom_expected:
THEN the user will will see the message 'You have no items in your cart'
AND the only option will be to close the cart

title: 'View Cart' banner is not available when returning from cart once items are removed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user deleted all of the items in the cart
custom_expected:
THEN the user will automatically be navigated back to the previous screen
AND the ‘View Cart’ banner will not display

title: Establishment name and location displays in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Establishment name displaying in the cart

title: The item amount displays for the item detail in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Item amount in the item detail displaying in the cart

title: The item name displays for the item detail in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Item name in the item detail displaying in the cart

title: The list of all modifiers displays for the item detail in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the list of all modifiers in the item detail displaying in the cart

title: View Cart banner is not available when returning from cart once checkout is complete
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added an item to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND and the user processes the payment to complete checkout
custom_expected:
THEN the user will automatically be navigated back to the previous screen
AND the ‘View Cart’ banner will not display

title: Total Price is listen in the checkout button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the Total price will display on the checkout button

title: All line items are listen out before displaying total
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN all of the line items are listed out before the total displays

title: The item Price displays for the item detail in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the Item price in the item detail displaying in the cart

title: Cost summary is available and displays in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the cost summary for all items displaying in the cart

title: Subtotal displays in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the subtotal for all items displaying in the cart

title: Tax included statement is available within the cost summary in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see a statement which indicates that a percentage of tax is included in the price

title: Tax amount is available within the cost summary in the cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has added items to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps the cart banner on the bottom of the screen
AND the user is navigated to the Cart
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the tax amount available within the cost summary displaying in the cart

title: Payment method line states "Payment Method” when no previous payment has been made (no default payment)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has never previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Payment method line states "Payment Method”

title: Activation text display as ‘Select’ when no previous payment has been made (no default payment)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has never previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Activation text display as ‘Select’

title: Payment method line displays Card image when a previous payment exists (default payment exists)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Payment method line displays Card image

title: Payment method line displays Card Type when a previous payment exists (default payment exists)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Payment method line displays the card type

title: Payment method line displays last 4 digits of card when a previous payment exists (default payment exists)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Payment method line displays the last 4 digits of card

title: Activation text display as ‘Change’ when a previous payment exists (default payment exists)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has previously made a payment
custom_steps: WHEN the user observes the Payment Method line
custom_expected: THEN the Activation text display as ‘Change’

title: Tapping the payment method button via cart navigates user to the Payment Method screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the CART
custom_steps: WHEN the user has tapped the Payment Method button
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be navigated to the payment method screen
AND the same exact rules apply as when navigating via the home screen

title: Display the payment method on the Cart that was selected via home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has selected a card as a default payment method via accessing the payment methods screen through the homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Cart
AND observes the payment method box
custom_expected: THEN card icon, card type, last 4 digits) with the button state “Change” will display

title: Display the text ‘Payment Method’ if payment method was not selected via home screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has NOT selected a card as a default payment method via accessing the payment methods screen through the homepage
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the Cart
AND observes the payment method box
custom_expected: THEN the text "Payment method" with button state “Select” will display

title: Check mark in the Home screen adjusts If payment method is selected in Cart so that they match
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user changes the default payment method via the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the home screen
AND accesses Payment Methods
custom_expected: THEN check mark will match the same selection as that in the cart

title: Spinner spins when ‘Place Order’ button is tapped
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has the payment method selected
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected: THEN a spinner will spin indicating that something is occuring

title: User is able to pay via Apple Pay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has Apple Pay as an option of payment
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is in the process of placing an order
AND the user selects Apple pay as the payment form 
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected: THEN the user’s Apple Pay account will be charged

title: User is able to pay via eCash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the payment methods screen
AND the user has eCash as an option of payment
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is in the process of placing an order
AND the user selects eCash as the payment form 
AND the user taps ‘Place Order’
custom_expected: THEN the user’s eCash account will be charged

title: Error message during checkout issue with payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has a payment method selected and is ready to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
AND there is an issue during submission
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the error message ‘Sorry, there was a problem with the credit card/payment method you selected’

title: Cancel button for Error message during checkout issue with payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has a payment method selected and is ready to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
AND there is an issue during submission
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the error message ‘Sorry, there was a problem with the credit card/payment method you selected’ 
AND the ‘Cancel’ button will be available
AND tapping cancel cancels out the process 
AND navigates the user back to the cart

title: Change Payment option for for user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the Cart
AND the user has a payment method selected and is ready to check out
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Place Order’
AND there is an issue during submission
AND the user receives an error
AND the user dismisses the error
custom_expected: THEN the user can tap 'change' to change the method of payment

title: Spinner spins when tapping ‘cancel’ on an already placed order
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to that order
AND the user cancels the order
custom_expected: THEN the spinner will spin indicating that something is occurring

title: Tapping ‘OK’ to alcohol not available message removes alcohol from cart
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user adds alcohol to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is checking out
AND the alcohol is no longer available in the venue
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be hit with the message 'Sorry, that item is temporarily unavailable from this vendor.’ 
AND upon tapping OK the user will be navigated to the cart 
AND the alcoholic beverages will automatically be removes
AND the order will not be submitted

title: Tapping ‘OK’ to alcohol not available message removes alcohol from cart when alcohol is the only item
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user adds alcohol to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is checking out
AND the alcohol is no longer available in the venue
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be hit with the message 'Sorry, that item is temporarily unavailable from this vendor.’ 
AND upon tapping OK the user will be navigated to an EMPTY cart 
AND the alcoholic beverages will automatically be removes
AND the order will not be submitted

title: User receives confirm deletion popup when attempting to remove an item via swipe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the CART
AND the user has items added to the cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes the item
custom_expected: THEN the delete confirmation popup appears

title: User receives confirm deletion popup when attempting to remove an item via edit mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the CART
AND the user has items added to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps edit
AND taps delete
custom_expected: THEN the delete confirmation popup appears

title: Item is removed when user confirms delete via swipe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the CART
AND the user has items added to the cart
AND the user had swiped the item
custom_steps:
WHEN the delete confirmation popup appears 
AND the user confirms delete
custom_expected: THEN the item will be deleted

title: Item is removed when user confirms delete via edit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the CART
AND the user has items added to the cart
AND the user tapped edit 
AND delete
custom_steps:
WHEN the delete confirmation popup appears 
AND the user confirms delete
custom_expected: THEN the item will be deleted

title: ‘Place Order’ button disappears when in edit mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the CART
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’ for an item
custom_expected: THEN the Place Order option will disappear

title: Deletion confirmation popup
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user swipes to delete an item
AND the deletion popup displays
custom_expected:
THEN the popup will state ‘Are you sure you want to remove (quantity) (Item name) (Modifier, Modifier, etc) from your cart?’
AND the user will have the options 
- Nevermid - Dismisses prompt, returns the user to their cart, and doesn’t remove the item.
- Ok - Dismisses prompt, returns user to their cart, and removes the item.”

title: Items remain in cart when user declines deletion popup confirmation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the cart
AND the popup deletion displays
custom_steps: WHEN the user declines deletion
custom_expected: THEN the item will not be removed from cart

title: User is able to update an added item
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is in the CART
AND the user has items added to the cart
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps ‘Edit’
AND taps on the item box
custom_expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the item update screen

title: Item is updated in cart when user saves update to an item
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user tapped an item in edit mode in the cart
AND has navigated to the item update screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes any changes to the item such as quantity or modifiers
AND taps ‘Update Item’
custom_expected: THEN the item will be updated in the cart

title: User is navigated back to cart when tapping ‘update item’
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user tapped an item in edit mode in the cart
AND has navigated to the item update screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes any changes to the item such as quantity or modifiers
AND taps ‘Update Item’
custom_expected:
THEN the item will be updated in the cart
AND the user will be navigated back to the cart

title: User is thrown an error if something went wrong during update of an item
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user tapped an item in edit mode in the cart
AND has navigated to the item update screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes any changes to the item such as quantity or modifiers
AND the user turns on airplane mode to lose connectivity
AND taps ‘Update Item’
custom_expected: THEN the user will be thrown an error alerting the user that something went wrong

title: User should be throwing ‘item not available’ message if alcohol is closed and was in the cart
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has alcohol in the cart
AND alcohol in this location is already closed
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the item update screen
AND the user attempts to update the item
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be hit with the ‘item not available’ message
AND the item will not be updated

title: Subtotal updates when user updates quantity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user tapped an item in edit mode in the cart
AND has navigated to the item update screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user makes any changes to the item such as quantity or modifiers
AND taps ‘Update Item’
custom_expected:
THEN the item will be updated in the cart
AND the user will be navigated back to the cart
AND the subtotal updates
